Photos from Harrison County Indiana Covid-19 Resources's post

Update information (mostly just that alternative/eLearning will continue through the end of the school year). Like before, this information will be pinned to the top of our Facebook page for easy reference. Thank you to all of our students, parents, teachers and staff members for staying strong! Week 3 underway...
